title: JSON Schema for D&D 5e senses.
description: This schema describes a list of senses. Passive Perception should not be included as it is a standard sense.

Blind_sight.description: `false` or provide Blind sight trait text.

Dark_vision.description: `false` or provide Dark vision trait text.

Tremor_sense.description: `false` or provide Tremor sense trait text.
